item.title: Sarah add a quote by Groucho Marx
item.description: "Outside of a dog, a book is man's best friend. Inside of a dog it's too dark to read." -- Groucho Marx

item.title: Sarah add a quote by Laura Hillenbrand
item.description: "His books were the closest thing he had to furniture and he lived in them the way other men live in easy chairs." -- Laura Hillenbrand

item.title: Sarah add a quote by Robin Sloan
item.description: "After that, the book will fade, the way all books fade in your mind. But I hope you will remember this: A man walking fast down a dark lonely street. Quick steps and hard breathing, all wonder and need. A bell above a door and the tinkle it makes. A clerk and a ladder and warm golden light, and then: the right book exactly, at exactly the right time." -- Robin Sloan

item.title: Sarah add a quote by Rebecca Wells
item.description: "Sidda can't help herself. She just loves books. Loves the way they feel, the way they smell, loves the black letters marching across the white pages..." -- Rebecca Wells

item.title: Sarah add a quote by Elizabeth Berg
item.description: "Don't let your habits become handcuffs" -- Elizabeth Berg

item.title: Sarah add a quote by Holly Goldberg Sloan
item.description: "It was possible that he was making some progress in his mental health condition by seeing me." -- Holly Goldberg Sloan

item.title: Sarah add a quote by Holly Goldberg Sloan
item.description: "It would look pretty messed up to be a social worker and have dried kid blood as a permanent stain in your vehicle." -- Holly Goldberg Sloan

item.title: Sarah add a quote by Holly Goldberg Sloan
item.description: "At least it's working out because Cheddar is sort of obsessed with me, or at least very interested, which in the world of felines counts as obsessive behavior." -- Holly Goldberg Sloan
